definition: A term commonly employed to describe the state of being present or occurring in all places or locations, without any specific limitations or exceptions. It is frequently used to convey the idea of something being pervasive, widespread, or omnipresent.

examples.german: Ich habe meine Schlüssel überall gesucht.
examples.english: I searched for my keys everywhere.

examples.german: Überall in der Stadt gibt es Cafés.
examples.english: There are cafes everywhere in the city.

examples.german: Die Kinder haben ihre Spielsachen überall verstreut.
examples.english: The children have scattered their toys everywhere.

examples.german: Überall um uns herum war Stille.
examples.english: There was silence all around us.
